item.title: extracting information from websites through xslt
item.description: Today, most websites feature some kind of feed, so every user who wants to stay in touch, can follow new publications very easily. Some sites support RSS-feeds or mail notification. Although this is pretty common, there are still sites out there who doesnâ€™t. For that purpose I tried to find some easy solution. First problem here is, how to get the information into some format usable. HTML is not meant for complex data mining operations.
